hero.title: Branding Class
hero.desc:
From Nothing to Having Loyalists, Just by Learning 6 Hours,
Learning Branding Has Never Been This Easy, See for Yourself.

brandingChallenge.title: Do you encounter the following problems with your brand?
brandingChallenge.challenge-1: Confused about how to start developing your brand?
brandingChallenge.challenge-2: Unsure about the direction for your brand and product development?
brandingChallenge.challenge-3: Not sure whether to focus on selling or branding first?
brandingChallenge.challenge-4: Struggling to compete without lowering prices?
brandingChallenge.challenge-5: Frustrated that high-quality products are not selling well?
brandingChallenge.desc: If you are facing one or more of these situations in your business, it might be a sign that your Branding is not fully developed yet.
brandingChallenge.solution: The Fantastic Brand Online Class could be the perfect solution for you.

benefit-1.title: Brand Strategy
benefit-1.desc: Learn step-by-step how a brand is born and grows to gain loyal followers, broken down into clear phases.

benefit-2.title: Focus Prioritization
benefit-2.desc: Every brand has unique challenges. With the branding journey, you'll easily identify which areas to prioritize for improvement.

reason.title: Why Should You Join Fantastic Brand?

reason-1.title: Fun Branding Materials
reason-1.desc: Fantastic Brand's content is delivered in a fun way. Easy-to-understand language makes learning enjoyable, not boring, easy to absorb, and can be immediately applied to your business.

reason-2.title: 40 complete and comprehensive videos
reason-2.desc: You won't need to struggle searching through 1,000,000 branding videos on platforms like YouTube.

reason-3.title: Only 6 hours of learning
reason-3.desc: All Fantastic Brand materials total about 6 hours. Spend just 1 hour per day, and you can build your brand in a week.

reason-4.title: Investment cost equals one month of SME data package
reason-4.desc: This class is specially designed for Indonesian SMEs. Many members say this knowledge should be worth millions of rupiah.

chapter-1.title: Chapter 1: Fundamentals
chapter-1.point-1: Introduction. You can't love what you don't know. Who is Dodi Zulkifli?
chapter-1.point-2: From Garage to Corporation. Many big businesses today started from humble beginnings in garages.
chapter-1.point-3: Strategy Not Tactics. What is strategy? Strategy is the way to achieve predetermined GOALS.
chapter-1.point-4: The Secret of All Secrets. A brand must be able to provide both emotional and tangible experiences to consumers.
chapter-1.point-5: Confusion and Difficulty. I fear the person who practiced one move 1,000 times more than the person who practiced 1,000 moves one time.
chapter-1.point-6: Preparation. Things you need to prepare before taking the Fantastic Brand class.

chapter-2.title: Chapter 2: Why Brand
chapter-2.point-1: Easier Selling. Buyers will trust subjects that already have Reputation more.
chapter-2.point-2: Immune to Competitors. With a strong brand, competitors can't easily take your customers.
chapter-2.point-3: Ads Get More Attention. When brands speak/advertise, the more recognized ones get more attention.
chapter-2.point-4: Can Be Sold. A brand is intangible but has selling value.
chapter-2.point-5: Can't Go Bankrupt. Brands don't go bankrupt, it's the business that experiences bankruptcy.
chapter-2.point-6: Creates Suggestion. Brand suggestion creates visualization of desired results.
chapter-2.point-7: Bigger Profits. It's easier to sell a known brand than an unknown one.

chapter-3.title: Chapter 3: Brand Development
chapter-3.point-1: Successful Brands. Valuable brands are those with loyalists, not just popularity.
chapter-3.point-2: Lose Loyalists, Lose Profits. A brand's value comes from its loyalists, not from product/service pricing.
chapter-3.point-3: Brand Journey Secret. A brand must provide both emotional and tangible experiences to consumers.
chapter-3.point-4: Focus on What You Can Control. Effects are beyond control. Causes are within control.
chapter-3.point-5: Quality But No Sales? My product is higher quality and cheaper, why do competitors sell more?
chapter-3.point-6: Pricing Formula. How to determine the right price for your product.
chapter-3.point-7: Negative Brand Equity. What happens when a brand has negative equity.
chapter-3.point-8: CEO's Duties. What exactly are a CEO's responsibilities?
chapter-3.point-9: 3-Step Brand Development. Brand Development is the process of building brand equity.

chapter-4.title: Chapter 4: Blueprint
chapter-4.point-1: Building Brands From Here. Brands have identities just like humans.
chapter-4.point-2: 2 Brand Blueprint Attributes. The identity concept of a brand that will live in customers' minds.
chapter-4.point-3: Why Customers Buy. Customers buy perception/reputation/trust, not quality.
chapter-4.point-4: Positioning Again... Differentiation starts from perception, not product features.
chapter-4.point-5: What Happens Without Positioning. Differentiation starts from perception, not product features.
chapter-4.point-6: Positioning Formula. Brand Positioning = Market Category + Segmentation + UVP.
chapter-4.point-7: Positioning Rules. What are the rules within positioning?
chapter-4.point-8: The Secret of Falling in Love. What happens when a product has no positioning?
chapter-4.point-9: More Alive Content. The secret behind brand content that feels more alive.
chapter-4.point-10: 3 Emotional Value Attributes. The three important emotional value attributes: Brand Vision, Brand Personality, and Brand Soul.
chapter-4.point-11: Which to Prioritize? Which aspects deserve more attention in your brand.

chapter-5.title: Chapter 5: Delivery
chapter-5.point-1: No Recognition, No Purchase. Customers don't buy reality, they buy your brand's perception in their minds.
chapter-5.point-2: Perception Trap. Wrong perceptions can create traps you don't realize.
chapter-5.point-3: 4 Loyalty Levels. Customer loyalty levels: Emotional Value, Rational Value, Habit, and No Choice.
chapter-5.point-4: 2 Brand Delivery Parts. Brand Delivery consists of Proof and Promise.
chapter-5.point-5: Brand Communication. How to communicate your brand's Promise to potential customers.
chapter-5.point-6: Rule of 7. Building reputation quickly with low budget.
chapter-5.point-7: Content Mapping. Time to shift communication from product focus to customer focus.
chapter-5.point-8: Visual Identity Creates Atmosphere. Customers buy perception not reality. Visual identity speeds up forming that perception.
chapter-5.point-9: Products Meet Expectations. What happens when equity and perception align in customers' minds!
chapter-5.point-10: Distribution Channel as Branding Tool. Distribution channels can be effective branding tools when used right!

testimonial.title: Hear From Those Who Took The Class First

testimonial-1.desc: Before learning about positioning, my revenue was 30 million/month. After understanding positioning, my hijab business now reaches 1 billion/month. Thank you, Mr. Dodi.
testimonial-1.name: - Gudang Hijab Murah Cirebon

testimonial-2.desc: When taking Fantastic Brand, even just the fundamental videos felt very relatable. After getting clues about MBP, I immediately applied what I learned. Within 1 month we achieved 100 million in revenue.
testimonial-2.name: - Reparasi Sofa Jakarta

testimonial-3.desc: After taking this online branding training, I successfully helped rebrand Abu Arkan Property to sell 36 plots in 3 weeks by changing its brand positioning. Salute to Coach Dodi, thank you Coach.
testimonial-3.name: - Smart Indo IBC

testimonial-4.desc: I just started a livestock business. After learning through Mr. Dodi's e-course, within about 1 month I got 8 clients with estimated revenue around 40 million. Thank you Mr. Dodi for providing scholarship access.
testimonial-4.name: - Aldis

testimonial-5.desc: For about 2 months I repeatedly studied the materials on positioning and brand canvas. After implementation, I got 6 clients with income around 15 million/month. Once again thank you Mr. Dodi and Neyma team.
testimonial-5.name: - Husnul

faq-1.question: Can I become an affiliate for this e-course?
faq-1.answer-1: By purchasing or becoming a member of this e-course, you automatically join the Fantastic Brand e-course affiliate program with a commission of Rp 111,600.
faq-1.answer-2: What are you waiting for? Besides learning, you can also earn income.

faq-2.question: Does this cover how to create logos & visual identity?
faq-2.answer-1: This online class is not about creating logos & visual identity, but rather focuses on the essence of strategically building and growing a business through branding.

faq-3.question: Does it discuss advertising?
faq-3.answer-1: This online class is also not about creating advertisements, although advertising is part of brand delivery.

faq-4.question: Is the material suitable for Resellers?
faq-4.answer-1: Yes, resellers don't build product brands (that's done by brand owners). But reselling is still a business. Essentially, resellers are like Indomar*t - both are retailers, just that Indomar*t is offline while resellers are online. They don't build the product brand, but they build their reseller brand.

faq-5.question: Is there a Guarantee?
faq-5.answer-1: A guarantee that you'll definitely succeed? I can't promise that, because no matter how good the lessons are, without your commitment and consistency to keep learning and practicing, there won't be progress.
faq-5.answer-2: Money-back guarantee? Unfortunately, I don't accept REFUND requests. So please only purchase if you really need it.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.desc: Let me introduce myself, I'm Dodi Zulkifli
aboutUs.point-2: Founder of Hasbuna Studio, Branding Express, Celcius Design, Derajat Celcius Printing.
aboutUs.point-3: Branding Practitioner & Business Owner for 21 years.
aboutUs.point-4: Creator of NeymaWay Canvas, Branding Journey, Positioning Hack Canvas - proven to help thousands of SMEs.
aboutUs.point-5: Brand Consultant with over 700 client portfolios across 35 business categories (including: culinary, fashion, cosmetics, education, etc).

product-1.name: Brand Naming E-course
product-1.desc: Many people use their child's name, spouse's name, or their own name for their brand. This video gives you insights on tips and tricks to find the perfect brand name for your business.

product-2.name: UVP & USP Video Guide
product-2.desc: What's the difference between Unique Value Proposition (UVP) and Unique Selling Proposition (USP)? Have you implemented both in your brand or products?

product-3.name: Repeat Order Strategy
product-3.desc: Every business owner dreams of customers repeatedly buying their products. This dream can become reality by applying what you'll learn in this video!

product-4.name: Authentic Content Creation Guide
product-4.desc: Social media content is key for brand communication. Learn how to create content that aligns with your brand positioning in this must-watch video.

product-5.name: 5 Strategies for Stuck Businesses
product-5.desc: All businesses face challenges during pandemics or recessions. Don't just sit back - learn these 5 strategies to overcome tough economic times.

product-6.name: 2 Practical Ways to Create Selling Positioning
product-6.desc: What exactly is positioning? Why do branding experts always talk about it? After understanding the concept, learn how to create the right positioning for your brand.

product-7.name: Ebook: Branding is More Than Advertising
product-7.desc: Step-by-step branding strategies you can apply to your current business or brand. Also useful for brands preparing to launch.

product-8.name: Ebook: 3-Step Branding for Food Business
product-8.desc: If you're in the food business, this ebook solves common challenges. Also perfect for those starting new culinary ventures.
